name: Laser Tank!: Or A Question of Functionality
name_original: Laser Tank!: Or A Question of Functionality
description:
How many keys will you sacrifice for power?

Controls:

  • W = Move forwards
  • S = Move backwards
  • A = Move (strafe) left
  • D = Move (strafe) right
  • Q = Turn (rotate) left
  • E = Turn (rotate) right
  • Space = Shoot
  • Use LMB to make selections

 Made for Ludum Dare 43 Jam (theme: "Sacrifices must be made") December 1-3, 2018.

Credits:

Programming: cfdj, Triforcesplash, angermango

Art: cfdj, Triforcesplash

"Audio": angermango

Tools used: Unity, Blender, Audacity, Krita.
